result.eng: The language they spoke was Irish and not English.
result.ga: Ba í Gaeilge seachas Béarla an teanga a labhair siad
result.orig: Ba í Gaeilge seachas Béarla an teanga a labhair siad
result.html: Ba í Gaeilge seachas Béarla an teanga a labhair siadThe language they spoke was Irish and not English.
result.ponchtml: Ba í Gaeilge seaċas Béarla an teanga a laḃair siadThe language they spoke was Irish and not English.

result.html: Labhair sí go gairidShe spoke briefly.
result.ponchtml: Laḃair sí go gairidShe spoke briefly.

result.eng: Nobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.
result.ga: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthu
result.orig: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthu
result.html: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthuNobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.
result.ponchtml: Níor laḃair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga ḃí dreaċ sollúnta orṫuNobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.
